basics.name: Amy Malia Takayesu
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: My mission is to help to advance humankind in a creative, beautiful and positive direction.

education.area: Computer Science, minor in Business Administration
courses: Introduction to Computer Science I & II
Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science I & II

work.summary: Contributed front-end code to the LiveNX web UI, with a focus on AngularJS.
highlights: Participated in agile development and worked through dozens of issues spanning over four releases (6.2.0, 6.2.1, 6.2.2, and 7.0)
Worked with the back-end team and a remote design team to integrate new management features into the web UI.
Improved customer support and customer on-boarding experiences by implementing LiveActionâ€™s first WalkMe solutions

work.summary: Assist professors in teaching undergraduate ICS courses (Introduction to Computer Science II, Programming Language Theory, Secure Coding, Software Engineering I & II).
highlights: Developed full lesson plans including class format, material, homework, facilitating discussions, and exams for Secure Coding class
Led and lectured 75-minute classes twice a week for Introduction to Computer Science II
Worked in small groups (3-4 students) with each student for Software Engineering I & II
Graded homework assignments and exams for Introduction to Computer Science II, Software Engineering I & II, and Programming Language Theory

work.summary: Worked with students and professors to ensure quality IT support in the ICS department.
highlights: Assisted with building and troubleshooting Windows computers for student labs
Assisted with security camera and surveillance system
Provided technical support to department staff
Maintained department equipment through general maintenance and weekly updates

volunteer.summary: Assisted in setting up and cleaning up hardware and testing of computer software
highlights: Tested Kali Linux, Metasploit, and VPN software
Set up the switches and cables necessary for the Blue Teams' networks

volunteer.summary: Executive board member of a Shidler business club, with a focus on club marketing.
highlights: Organized two large and successful promotional and fundraising events at Nocturna Lounge
Assisted club president and other officers with miscellaneous club duties

awards.title: Centennial Bonus Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen with high academic achievements and high standardized test scores.
